description:
It keeps permissions even on microsoft compatible target usb sticks.
And it is easy to find individual backup files.

I note there may be newer versions on the home website, 
and that v4.9 displays an incorrect website use https://kornelix.net or https://kornelix.net/ukopp/ukopp.html
summary: Seems great from a quick try

description:
The interface LOOKED nice, but nowhere did it ask for "Source" or "Destination", it just called everything "target" - confusing.

Some clear instructions (or less confusing interface might make this very nice. I would love to try it, but I can't figure out how. 

I wanted to backup the entire system (including /boot and /), excluding /home, to a different HDD. I could figure out the exclude section, but not how to include the entire system (other than /home). 

By entire system, I mean EVERYTHING except /home.
summary: Not clear how to use it

description: I think what Debian are great, but other distros exist like a opensuse but why are out of your mind when you made this piece of software?
summary: Why do you say for Linux but are just for a few distros?

description: il y a tellement de soft de syncro et backup. FreeFileSync est en français, Grsync est aussi en français alors ukopp a la benne
summary: rien en français, et documentation minable meme pas de copie d'écran
